channel.title: Market Rebellion
channel.description: Daily options trading insights from Jon and Pete Najarian and the team at Market Rebellion. We share our take on the day’s stock market as viewed through unusual options activity and technical analysis.

item.description:
💥 SEIZE CONTROL OF YOUR FINANCIAL DESTINY - Get a custom-designed educational package tailored to your individual trading needs, skill level, and schedule. We provide weekly trade ideas paired with newsletters & webinars that guide you through the trades. https://marketrebellion.com/getstarted/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=marketrebellion
-------------------------------
📖 Get a FREE copy of Jon & Pete Najarian’s book “Follow the Smart Money (shipping & handling included): https://marketrebellion.com/follow-the-smart-money/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=marketrebellion
👉 Want more free market intel? Check out Market Rebellion’s Rebel Hub for the biggest stories on market-moving events, how-to trading guides, and the latest in Unusual Option Activity from Jon and Pete Najarian: https://marketrebellion.com/news/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=marketrebellion
🍀TNT Options: Trade ideas look to combine momentum with technical levels, to use the power of options leverage geared to capturing break outs and break downs. More: https://marketrebellion.com/subscriptions/tnt-options/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=marketrebellion
🔒Ready to start trading? Try Options Oracle. Led by Chartered Market Technician AJ Monte, Options Oracle combines diagonal spreads with technical analysis to set up powerful two-pronged swing trades. https://marketrebellion.com/subscriptions/options-oracle/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=marketrebellion
📝Sign up for our FREE Daily IV Report: https://marketrebellion.com/daily-iv-sign-up/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=marketrebellion
Connect with Market Rebellion! -- Website: https://marketrebellion.com/ -- Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarketRebels​​ -- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/marketrebels -- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/mark... -- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NajarianBrot... -- TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@officialmarke...
-------------------------------
ABOUT MARKET REBELLION
Market Rebellion is on a mission to empower independent investors to take control of their own financial destiny with trade ideas, education, content, and tools.
Eager to get going? Contact one of our sales specialists can discuss your needs and ways Market Rebellion can best serve you. 1 (888) 982-8342
